titleStmt.title: Letters and papers from the Committee of Estates and Commissioners of Scotland, concerning the Kings comming into the Scottish armie: and his Maiesties giving his consent to the surrender of Newarke to the Parliament. Dated the 7th and 8th of this instant May 1646. Commanded to be forthwith printed and published.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.
Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
